[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: add_switchboard_aggregator()] [Malicious Aggregator] Can admin add a malicious switchboard aggregator that returns manipulated prices to drain vault? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: add_switchboard_aggregator()] [Type Confusion] Can asset_type String contain special characters or very long strings that break oracle lookups? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: add_switchboard_aggregator()] [Aggregator Validation] Does add_switchboard_aggregator() validate that aggregator is active and returning prices before adding? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: add_switchboard_aggregator()] [Clock Staleness] Does add_switchboard_aggregator() use clock parameter to check aggregator staleness? Can stale aggregator be added? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: remove_switchboard_aggregator()] [Remove Active Asset] Can remove_switchboard_aggregator() be called for asset_type that vault currently holds, causing subsequent operations to fail? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: remove_switchboard_aggregator()] [In-Operation Removal] If remove_switchboard_aggregator() is called during active operation, can this break mid-operation price checks? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: remove_switchboard_aggregator()] [Non-existent Asset] What happens if remove_switchboard_aggregator() is called for asset_type that doesn't exist? DoS or silent success? (Low)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: remove_switchboard_aggregator()] [Oracle DoS] Can admin remove all aggregators to DoS vault operations requiring price feeds? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: change_switchboard_aggregator()] [Price Jump] Can change_switchboard_aggregator() cause sudden price jump between old and new aggregator, exploitable for sandwich attacks? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: change_switchboard_aggregator()] [Mid-Operation Change] If aggregator is changed during active operation, which price feed is used for end_op() valuation? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: change_switchboard_aggregator()] [Decimals Change] Can change_switchboard_aggregator() change to aggregator with different decimals without updating decimals field? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: change_switchboard_aggregator()] [Atomicity] Is aggregator change atomic with respect to operations using it? Can race condition cause mixed old/new prices? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: set_update_interval()] [Zero Interval] Can set_update_interval(0) disable staleness checks entirely, allowing infinitely stale prices? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: set_update_interval()] [Too Large Interval] Can setting update_interval to u64::MAX make all prices permanently stale? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: set_update_interval()] [Retroactive Interval] Does changing update_interval retroactively validate existing cached prices? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: set_update_interval()] [Operation Impact] Can attacker front-run operation by having admin set update_interval very high to accept stale prices? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: set_dex_slippage()] [Excessive Slippage] Can set_dex_slippage() be set to 100% or higher, allowing adaptors to accept any price for DEX swaps? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: set_dex_slippage()] [Zero Slippage] Can set_dex_slippage(0) brick all DEX operations that need minimum slippage tolerance? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: set_dex_slippage()] [Slippage Manipulation] Can admin time set_dex_slippage() calls to enable favorable DEX trades for specific operator transactions? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: set_dex_slippage()] [Type Confusion] Is dex_slippage a u64 or u256? Can overflow occur in slippage calculations with large values? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: retrieve_deposit_withdraw_fee()] [Drain Attack] Can admin call retrieve_deposit_withdraw_fee() for entire fee balance during active operation, affecting vault value calculations? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: retrieve_deposit_withdraw_fee()] [Amount Validation] Does retrieve_deposit_withdraw_fee() validate that amount doesn't exceed deposit_withdraw_fee_collected balance? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: retrieve_deposit_withdraw_fee()] [Zero Amount] Can retrieve_deposit_withdraw_fee(0) be called to emit events without actual transfer? (Low)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: retrieve_deposit_withdraw_fee()] [Balance Underflow] If amount > deposit_withdraw_fee_collected, can this cause balance underflow or abort? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Function: retrieve_deposit_withdraw_fee()] [Concurrent Retrieval] Can admin and operator both call retrieve functions simultaneously to drain more than available fees? (High)
